text: Jean-Guy Hamelin (October 8, 1925 – March 1, 2018) was a Canadian Roman Catholic bishop. He was born in Saint-Sévérin-de-Proulxville, Quebec. Hamelin was ordained to the priesthood on June 11, 1949 in Trois-Rivières, Québec and was named first bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rouyn-Noranda, Canada on November 29, 1973. He retired on November 30, 2001, succeeded by Dorylas Moreau and named Bishop Emeritus. Hamelin died on March 1, 2018, aged 92 in Rouyn-Noranda.Bishop Jean-Guy Hamelin == References == Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Canadian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Jean-Guy Hamelin
